source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_SEQ_00<tab>Jalzahn seems to be glaring at Gerolt.
target: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_SEQ_00<tab>ハーストミルのジャルザーンは、何やら悩んでいるようだ。

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_SEQ_01<tab>Jalzahn complains that Gerolt's preoccupation with kettle-making has made it impossible to address the question of who should rightfully bear the title of Starforger. Having been wholly unable to tear Gerolt away from the object of his obsession, he asks that you attempt to reason with the heedless blacksmith in his stead.
target: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_SEQ_01<tab>ジャルザーンは、『ゾディアックマイスター』の称号を勝手に名乗っているゲロルトから、称号を取り返したいようだ。しかし、ゲロルトはヤカン作りに夢中で、話を聞こうとしないらしい。ハーストミルの「ゲロルト」に事情を聞いてみよう。

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_SEQ_02<tab>Gerolt is swift to dismiss you, but you decide to relay Jalzahn's message regardless. He duly rejects the alchemist's appeal out of hand, and demands that you help him apply the finishing touches to his latest brainchild: a kettle valuable enough to pay off his debts and restore his renown in one fell swoop. For this masterwork, he apparently requires fifty pieces of alexandrite...
target: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_SEQ_02<tab>ゲロルトと話した。ゲロルトが人生を賭けているヤカン作りに協力することになった。ヤカンに輝きをあたえるため、「<var 28 ((Item)) F21ECB01 /var>」を50個入手し、ハーストミルの「ゲロルト」に渡そう。

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_SEQ_03<tab>Having taken receipt of the alexandrite, Gerolt wastes no time finishing his masterpiece, and with a bang and a clang, he presents to you a kettle of breathtaking quality. Drawn by the clamor of hammer and anvil, Jalzahn then comes to inspect Gerolt's work. Though reasonably impressed, the alchemist declares that the kettle is not yet of a standard befitting the creator of a Zodiac Weapon, and duly offers to help Gerolt improve it. For this purpose, he requests that you furnish him with ten bottles of Thavnairian mist.
target: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_SEQ_03<tab>ゲロルトに「<var 28 ((Item)) F21ECB01 /var>」を渡した。冒険者の協力によって、「特別なヤカン」が完成した。しかし、その様子を見ていたジャルザーンによれば、そのヤカンは本物ではないという。どうやら、ジャルザーンもヤカン作りに協力するようだ。ヤカンにさらなる輝きをあたえるため、「<var 28 ((Item)) F2187C01 /var>」を10個入手し、ハーストミルの「ジャルザーン」に渡そう。

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_SEQ_04<tab>Through the power of alchemy, the kettle is reborn, a vision of culinary perfection. Eager to test their masterpiece, Gerolt and Jalzahn triumphantly set about making tea, only for Drake to appear, his face a picture of dismay. Having been forced to expedite a large order of kettles, the young apprentice admits to having forsaken quality for quantity, producing wares which he fears will have customers up in arms. Though Gerolt and Jalzahn say nothing, both cannot help noticing that Drake's offerings perform markedly better than their own. When Drake subsequently departs, head hung in shame, both blacksmith and alchemist loudly proclaim their intention to begin their work in earnest. Jalzahn duly decides to infuse the kettle with an aether-rich elixir, but requires an Inferno fragment, Vortex fragment, and Crag fragment to complete the task. Gerolt bids you good luck as they prepare for the next phase of their plan.
target: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_SEQ_04<tab>ジャルザーンに「<var 28 ((Item)) F2187C01 /var>」を渡した。冒険者の協力によって、「アルティメットケトル・ゼニス」が完成した。しかし、その様子を見ていたドレイクの発言に動揺したふたりは、ヤカンにさらなる磨きをかけるという。ヤカンに真なる輝きをあたえるため、「極イフリート討滅戦」を攻略して「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C1601 /var>」を、「極ガルーダ討滅戦」を攻略して「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C1701 /var>」を、「極タイタン討滅戦」を攻略して「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C1801 /var>」を、それぞれ入手しよう。

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_SEQ_05<tab>You brave scorching flames, gale-force winds, and terrible tremors to procure the materials needed for Gerolt's kettle. Hurry back to Hyrstmill that he may at last complete his magnum opus.
target: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_SEQ_05<tab>ゲロルトから依頼された品をすべて集めた。ハーストミルの「ゲロルト」に渡そう。

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_SEQ_06<tab>Thanks to your efforts, Gerolt and Jalzahn are able to combine their skills to create what is undoubtedly the zenith of kitchen utensils─Ultimate Kettle Nexus. Gerolt is especially overjoyed at the sight, knowing his return to fame is all but assured. With eerily impeccable timing, however, Drake appears once again, bearing more unfortunate news. According to him, this particular kettle was requested just over two years ago, the order having long since been canceled. Hearing this, Gerolt is predictably inconsolable, lamenting the millions of gil that would have ensured his freedom from debt. Jalzahn, meanwhile, is furious. Before you know it, the pair begin exchanging words and then blows, succeeding at last in rendering each other unconscious. In light of all that has occurred, Drake suggests you keep the kettle as a token of thanks for your well-intentioned help.
target: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_SEQ_06<tab>ゲロルトに依頼された品を渡した。冒険者の協力によって、エオルゼア最強のヤカン「アルティメットケトル・ネクサス」が完成した。だが、ゲロルトの納品が遅かったことで、人生を賭けたヤカン作りは失敗に終わり、『ゾディアックマイスター』の称号を賭けた勝負も有耶無耶になってしまった。まだまだ、このふたりとの付き合いは長そうだ……。

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Gerolt.
target: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_TODO_00<tab>ゲロルトと話す

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the pieces of alexandrite to Gerolt.
target: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_TODO_01<tab>ゲロルトに<var 28 ((Item)) F21ECB01 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the Thavnairian mist to Jalzahn.
target: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_TODO_02<tab>ジャルザーンに<var 28 ((Item)) F2187C01 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_TODO_03<tab>Obtain an Inferno fragment in the Bowl of Embers (Extreme).
target: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_TODO_03<tab>極イフリートを倒して<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C1601 /var>を入手

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_TODO_04<tab>Obtain a Vortex fragment in the Howling Eye (Extreme).
target: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_TODO_04<tab>極ガルーダを倒して<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C1701 /var>を入手

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_TODO_05<tab>Obtain a Crag fragment in the Navel (Extreme).
target: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_TODO_05<tab>極タイタンを倒して<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C1801 /var>を入手

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_TODO_06<tab>Deliver the materials to Gerolt.
target: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_TODO_06<tab>ゲロルトに依頼品を渡す

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_000<tab>Curse that drunken boor of a man. How am I to reclaim my title if─
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_000……まったく、ゲロルトめ。
どうすれば、奴から称号を取り返せるのか……。

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_001<tab>Oh, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Pray forgive my grumblings.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_001おお、お主か！
すまん、考え事をしておったのだ。

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_002<tab>As you no doubt remember, Gerolt stubbornly refuses to relinquish the title of Starforger, and we have been at odds ever since the completion of your Zodiac Weapon Zeta.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_002覚えておろう……。
先の「ゾディアックウェポン・ゼータ」の創造過程で勃発した、
私とゲロルトの血で血を洗う争いを！

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_003<tab>I will not deny he is a talented blacksmith, but I am of the Ulthalam line! My forefather penned the Book of Netherdark, whose pages revealed the truth of the Zodiac Weapons. Who is he to deny my birthright?
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_003「黄道十二文書：霊獄」を記した我が一族の開祖、
ウルタラムの血を引く私と、武器を打っただけのゲロルト……。
どちらが『ゾディアックマイスター』の称号に相応しいか！

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_004<tab>Now he insists that everyone refer to him as <var 1A 02 /var>Gerolt the Starforger<var 1A 01 /var>, more often than not too deep in his cups to be reasoned with.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_004私にこそ相応しいこの称号を、
ゲロルトが勝手に名乗り始めてからというもの、
それを取り返すため、幾度となく奴を説得してきた……。

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_010<tab>When not drowning in ale, he drowns out the world with his hammer, pounding away on his godsforsaken kettles. And should anyone so much as whisper in his general vicinity, he shouts and bawls like an overtired toddler.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_010だが、当のゲロルトは相変わらずヤカン作りに夢中……
話にならず困っていてな。

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_015<tab>When not drowning in ale, he drowns out the world with his hammer, pounding away on his godsforsaken kettles. Or rather he <var 1A 02 /var>did<var 1A 01 /var>. Lately, he has taken to leaving for days on end, and I struggle to get a word in edgeways on the rare occasions he <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> here.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_015だが、当のゲロルトは相変わらずヤカン作りに夢中……
それに、どこに行っているのか近ごろよく外出していて、
話にならず困っていてな。

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_020<tab>I realize he has a singular fixation with his crafting, but something is different this time. <sigh> At this rate, I will <var 1A 02 /var>never<var 1A 01 /var> reclaim my family's legacy.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_020どうやら、今作っているヤカンは、特に念を入れているらしく、
説得しようにも、決着のための勝負を持ちかけようにも、
それどころではないとの一点張りで、埒があかん……。

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_021<tab>...Unless, perhaps, you spoke to him in my stead. I know of no other for whom he would halt his hammering, let alone listen to them having done so.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_021……待てよ、私からは無理でも、
あの時立ち会ったお主の言葉であれば、
ゲロルトも話を聞くかもしれんな……。

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_022<tab>Please, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─see if you can talk some sense into him.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_022頼む、)) (( )) 02 /var>よ。
どうかお主からも、奴を説得してもらえないだろうか！

source:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_030Hmmm...maybe the spout could do with bein' a bit more─
Eh? Oh, it's you.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_030もう少しだ、このヤカンさえ完成すれば…………。
……ん、なんだ、テメェか。

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_100_030<tab>Whatever it is, ye can take it up with Drake over there. This kettle's not goin' to make itself.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_100_030残念だが、オレは今、猛烈に忙しい！
何か用なら、ドレイクのヤツに……。

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_100_031<tab>If I had to guess, Ardashir sent ye, but I ain't got time fer that. If it's not about me kettle, ye can take it up with Drake over there.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_100_031「アニマウェポン」の話か？
残念だが、オレは今、猛烈に忙しい！
何か用なら、ドレイクのヤツに……。

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_031<tab>The daft sod's still chunterin' about who gets to call himself the bloody Starforger, is he? Well, tell him to shut his gob, 'cause it's <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var>. End o' story.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_031……なに、ジジイが称号を返せだと？
あの野郎、まだそんなこと言ってんのか。
『ゾディアックマイスター』の称号はオレのもンだろうに……。

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_032<tab>I've got more important things to worry about, like this kettle here. It's me ticket to freedom, an' a fresh start down at the pub.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_032っと、それどころじゃねェ！
オレは、今打っているこのヤカンに、人生を賭けているンだ！

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_033<tab>When I've finished, it'll be the finest bloody kettle in all of Eorzea─an' I've got a customer what'll pay a sultana's bleedin' ransom fer it too. It'll be just like the good old days, you wait an' see. Folk'll come crawlin' to have work done by yer old mate Gerolt.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_033ある人物から発注を受けた「特別なヤカン」……。
これが認められれば、オレはこんな生活を抜け出して、
かつての栄光を取り戻すことができる！

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_034<tab>Come to think of it, since yer here an' all, there's a few things I need, if yer feelin' helpful. The sooner I finish, the sooner I can see about gettin' rid o' Jalzahn.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_034そうだ、)) (( )) 02 /var>！
このヤカンを完成させるために力を貸してくれねェか？
コイツが片付けば、ジジイとの勝負でも何でもしてやるからよ。

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_100_034<tab>An' before ye say no, just remember who made that precious Zodiac Weapon o' yours─'cause it didn't make its-bleedin'-self. Well? What do ye say?
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_100_034ともに「ゾディアックウェポン」を再創造した仲だろう！？
な、頼む、手伝ってくれ！

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_100_035<tab>An' before ye say no, just remember who made that precious Zodiac Weapon o' yers─<var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> agreed to help you out with that anima business out o' the kindness of his heart. S'only fair ye return the favor. So what do ye say?
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_100_035ともに「ゾディアックウェポン」を再創造して、
さらに「アニマウェポン」を作ってる仲だろう！？
な、頼む、手伝ってくれ！

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_035<tab>I knew I could count on ye. The thing's pretty much done, to tell the truth, but it needs somethin' extra. A shine what'll make 'em forget it's only a tool fer boilin' water. Seein' you here actually gave me an idea.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_035ありがてェ！
ヤカンはまもなく完成するが、どうにも仕上げが物足りなくてな。
何か光沢を出す素材を探していたンだが……。

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_036<tab>Ye remember them pieces of alexandrite we used for yer Zodiac Weapon? The stuff looks stunnin' when light hits it the right way─like moonlight glintin' off the lip of a grog bottle. Might be as I can use it to give this kettle a nice sheen.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_036……ヘヘッ、テメェを見て思い出したぜ。
以前「ゾディアックウェポン」を作っている過程で、
「」ってヤツを使ったはずだ。

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_037<tab>Should be easy to round up a few for someone like you.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_037あれはたしか、光を変容させる性質があるダークマターの一種。
表面加工に使えば上手くいくかもしれん！

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_038<tab>Bring me, say, fifty pieces of alexandrite, an' I should have enough fer a nice even coat. I'm countin' on ye, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_038よし、)) (( )) 02 /var>。
「」を50個ほど持ってきてくれねェか！
期待して待ってるぜ！

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_040<tab>Bring me fifty pieces of alexandrite, an' I guarantee this kettle'll blind folk with its beauty.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_040おう、)) (( )) 02 /var>。
「」を50個ほど持ってきてくれねェか！

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_050<tab>Good on ye, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>. Now let's make her shine, eh?
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_050……たしかに受け取った！
よし、こいつで…………。

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_060<tab><pant> <pant> ...Bloody alexandrite. Like forcin' out a three-day shite, that was. Worth the trouble, though.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_060で、できたぜ……。
どうだ、手に持って、その完成度を見やがれ！

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_061<tab>Finest I've ever made, if I do say so meself. A kettle fit fer royalty, or at least them rich nobs what drink their tea with fancy cakes and such.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_061それが、オレが魂を込めて打った「究極のヤカン」だ……！
どうだ、最高の出来だろう！

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_065<tab>I'll bet it wouldn't take more'n a count o' sixty at most to make a crackin' mulled tea in that. <var 1A 02 /var>Genius<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_065そのヤカンなら、極上のマルドティーを、
1分で沸かすことができるだろうぜ！

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_070<tab>What is this? You chose to ignore the legacy of my family line─my birthright─for this pathetic piece of tin?
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_070なんということだ……そんなもんを作るために、
名誉ある称号についての話を聞かなかったというのか……。

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_075<tab>Why don't ye come over here an' say that, you opo-faced sack o'─
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_075ジジイ……！？
そんなもんとはなんだ、このヤカンにはなぁ……！

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_080<tab>...I see. Crafting this <var 1A 02 /var>perfect<var 1A 01 /var> kettle is meant to restore your reputation, is it?
target: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_080<tab>……ふむ、人生を賭けた最高のヤカンか。

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_081<tab>Well, for what it's worth, I think the kettle is exquisite. It possesses a transcendent sheen unlike any kettle you have made thus far.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_081たしかに、そのヤカンは素晴らしい。
そこいらのものとは違う輝きを放っているようだ。

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_082<tab>But I will not be blinded by the waning glimmer of such tawdry wares. Have you no shame, man!?
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_082だが、「ゾディアックウェポン」を再創造した今ならわかる。
…………その輝きが「偽物」だと！

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_095<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Eh<var 1A 01 /var>!?
target: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_095<tab>な、なンだと……！？

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_100<tab>Come now, Gerolt. After forging something as fine as a Zodiac Weapon, surely you can see this kettle is not yet worthy of your name!
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_100一流の武具職人だったお主なら、わかっているはずだ！
このヤカンは「究極」を名乗るに相応しくはない！！

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_105<tab>Well, I...
target: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_105<tab>ジ、ジジイ…………。

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_110<tab>Though we are rivals, Gerolt, our time together should not count for naught. Why did you not consult me sooner? I am willing to set aside our differences, for now, if this is really so important to you.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_110ふふふ、お主との付き合いも、だてに長くはないからな。
お主の心の僅かな隙間くらい見抜ける……。
人生を賭けるような大一番、なぜ私に相談せんのだ。

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_111<tab>To create a truly perfect kettle, one worthy of bearing your mark, you must be uncompromising. If I understand correctly, your reputation is at stake here; nothing must be left to chance. Which is precisely why I will help you.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_111ゲロルトよ、究極のヤカンを目指すというのなら、
一切の妥協を許さず、徹底的に突き詰めろ！
そのために、私も協力しよう！

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_112<tab><sniff> Yer all right, Jalzahn. If yer willin' to help, I won't say no.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_112ジャルザーン、テメェというヤツは……。
……ありがとうよ。

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_113<tab>Under the circumstances, it seems the least I can do. Were it not for your aid, my life's work would still be a distant dream. But mark my words, Gerolt: when this kettle is complete, we will settle the matter of the Starforger title.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_113なに、ともに戦った仲ではないか。
その代わり、お主が真に満足するヤカンが完成した時……
その時こそ、称号を賭けて、私との勝負を受けてもらうぞ！

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_114<tab>Aye, fair do's. Ye've got yerself a deal.
target: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_114<tab>ああ、約束するぜ……！

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_115<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I will need you to procure some few bottles of Thavnairian mist for our work.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_115)) (( )) 02 /var>よ、霊薬だ……！
「」を手に入れてくるのだ！

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_116<tab>Ten should suffice, I think. Soon the very stars in the firmament will seem pale next to this kettle's all-surpassing shine!
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_116かつて、私が作った「」……。
あれが10個ほどあれば、私の錬金術を以って、
このヤカンに究極の輝きをあたえてみせる！

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_120<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Do you have the Thavnairian mist we require?
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_120)) (( )) 02 /var>よ、霊薬だ……！
「」を10個ほど手に入れてくるのだ！

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_130<tab>Yes, this is indeed the genuine article. Never in all my years did I imagine using something so precious on something so...peculiar. Well, let us see what the power of alchemy can do for his kettle.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_130……うむ、たしかに受け取ったぞ！
ふふ、こんなところでわしの発明が役立つとはな！
いくぞ、今こそ、私の錬金術で……！

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_140<tab>Now that... <pant> That, my good sir, is how you make a kettle. Behold, the rich glow of finely wrought pottery.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_140で、できたぞ……。
どうだ、手に持って、その完成度を見るといい！

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_145<tab>If ever there were legends born of kitchenware, this would surely warrant a place among them. The choicest fruit of the realm's most masterful blacksmith, and her most accomplished alchemist─I give you...Ultimate Kettle Zenith!
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_145それが、一流の武具職人と一流の錬金術師の渾身の作……！
名付けて「アルティメットケトル・ゼニス」だ！

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_150<tab>Well, I'll be thrice damned! Rhalgr Himself'd be proud to have a kettle like that on his table. I bet ye could whip up a nice blend o' mulled tea in a count o' thirty with that!
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_150ぬおおおお！　こ、これが至天の輝きッ！
そのヤカンなら、極上のマルドティーを、
30秒で沸かすことができるだろうぜ！

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_DRAKE_000_160<tab>Uh...excuse me, Master Gerolt. I hate to interrupt, but...
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_DRAKE_000_160……あの、お師匠様。
盛り上がっているところ、すみません。

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_DRAKE_000_161<tab>It's about the kettles for our client at the Rosewood Stalls. I thought you should know I've taken care of their order, and it should arrive in Gridania within the day.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_DRAKE_000_161先日、グリダニアの紫檀商店街から発注のあったヤカンですが、
先ほど商品を出荷しておきました。

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_DRAKE_000_162<tab>The thing is... <sigh> The thing is, they insisted that the goods be delivered early, and I was forced to forgo quality for the sake of crafting the requisite number in time. I'm terribly sorry.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_DRAKE_000_162ただ、納期が短かったもので、
数を揃えるのを優先してしまって……

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_DRAKE_000_165<tab>I tested one with mulled tea to gauge its boiling speed, and... <sniff> ...regrettably, it took a full count of twenty to prepare. I pray they will be merciful in their appraisal, knowing it was but a lowly apprentice, and not your masterful hand, that accommodated their request.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_DRAKE_000_165極上のマルドティーを、20秒で沸かす程度の品質で精一杯でした。
先方にはご満足いただけたのですが、
己の不甲斐なさを反省するばかりです……。

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_DRAKE_000_166<tab>Next, I believe, is an arms order from the House of Splendors. It has been ages since they last requested our services. I only hope the quality of my work will not discourage future business.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_DRAKE_000_166さて、次に作るのは、ロウェナ商会に出荷する武具ですよね？
これも最近は発注数が少なくなってきましたねぇ……。

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_DRAKE_000_167<tab>Ah, forgive me. I did not mean to sour the mood with talk of my shortcomings. Mayhap your coming masterpiece will serve to inspire me. I very much look forward to seeing it when it's finished.
target: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_DRAKE_000_167<tab>あ、盛り上がっているところ、失礼しました。

source:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_170Er...
...Looks like we've made a decent start on that kettle, then! Ain't that right, Jalzahn?
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_170よ、よし！
ここ、これでようやく、基礎となるヤカンができたな！

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_175<tab>O-Oh, yes, yes of course! A fine start indeed. At last we can begin our work in earnest!
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_175そそそ、そうだとも！
ここ、これからが本番なのだから！

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_180<tab>Somethin' wrong, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Ye didn't think we was <var 1A 02 /var>finished<var 1A 01 /var>, did ye? Far from it! That was just the, er, <var 1A 02 /var>roughin'-out<var 1A 01 /var> stage, see? Now's the part where we turn her into a <var 1A 02 /var>real<var 1A 01 /var> kettle!
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_180)) (( )) 02 /var>……！
「アルティメットケトル・ゼニス」に、最後の磨きをかけるぞ！

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_190<tab>Yes...yes, the all-important <var 1A 02 /var>realization<var 1A 01 /var> stage. For this, I fear we will need elixirs of a much greater potency.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_190だが、真なる輝きを求めるとなると……。
……危険だが、「アレ」を作るしかないか。

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_191<tab>A quasi-soul potion rich with aether should serve our purposes well. Boiling it down inside the kettle will allow me to interfuse and apply the solution in a single stroke. But its boiling point is incredibly high.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_191私が錬金術で、究極の疑似魂魄霊薬を作る。
そして、これを「アルティメットケトル・ゼニス」で煮詰める！
問題は、霊薬の沸点の高さだ！

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_192<tab>We would need flames from the bowels of an inferno, the fiercest of gales to fan them, and the stoutest earth to contain them.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_192)) (( )) 02 /var>。
私とゲロルトが準備をしている間、
お主には、仕上げのための素材を用意してもらいたい。

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_193<tab>Quite what form such ingredients might take, I cannot say, but I must ask that you find them nonetheless.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_193必要なのは、地獄の業火の如き炎と、
炎を維持するための烈風……。
それに、炉を作るための黄土だ。

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_194<tab>Sounds like what we're lookin' fer are fragments from primals─namely, Ifrit, Garuda, and Titan.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_194つまり、「」と、
「」、「」を、
それぞれ用意しろってことか……。

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_195<tab>...They may very well suffice, yes. If you would be so good as to procure them, we will make a kettle for the ages!
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_195頼んだぞ、盟友)) (( )) 02 /var>よ！
真なる輝きのために！

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_200<tab>Good to see ye back, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>, an' with all yer limbs, at that. Did ye get what we need?
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_200どうだ、「」と、
「」、「」……。
それぞれ、用意はできそうか？

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_215<tab>Listen...I know riskin' yer neck fetchin' pointless shite fer folk is yer specialty, but this means a lot. Seriously. Yer more than just another adventurer─yer a mate. <cough> But enough o' this sentimental bollocks. We've got a kettle to make!
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_215ヘヘッ、オレのために蛮神と戦ってくれるとはよ……。
し、心配し……いや、なんだ……やっぱりテメェは最高だ！
それじゃ、気合い入れていくぜッ……！

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_220<tab><pant> <pant> We...we did it! There's no toppin' that! Not this time! Hold her up and see fer yerself.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_220で、できたぞ……。
今度こそ、最高の……「究極のヤカン」の完成だ！
どうだ、手に持って、その完成度を確かめてくれ！

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_225<tab>Now that there's a <var 1A 02 /var>true<var 1A 01 /var> kettle o' legend, and the finest piece o' pottery Eorzea'll ever see─Ultimate Kettle Nexus!!!
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_225それこそ、エオルゼア最強のヤカン……！！
名付けて「アルティメットケトル・ネクサス」だ！！

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_230<tab>By the gods, what an exquisite glow! Armed with such a kettle, I am quite certain one could prepare a flawless mulled tea in a count of ten─no, <var 1A 02 /var>five<var 1A 01 /var>. Mayhap even less!
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_230な、なんというまばゆい輝きなのだ！
そのヤカンなら、極上のマルドティーを、
10秒……いや、5秒で沸かすこともできるだろう！

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_240<tab>Thank you. Both o' ye. When me client sees this little beauty, word's bound to travel fast. Folk the realm over'll be cryin' out fer me wares, just like back in the good old days.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_240ありがとうよ、ふたりとも……。
コイツを納品すれば、
オレは、かつての栄光を取り戻すことができる。

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_245<tab>I have no doubt the road to your former glory is now clear before you. Which only leaves the not-so-small matter of my Starforger title. I trust you have not forgotten our agreement?
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_245ふふ、エオルゼア随一の武具職人の本領発揮というわけか。
ならば、『ゾディアックマイスター』の称号を賭けて、
全力で戦ってもらうぞ！

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_250<tab>Nay, I've not forgotten. I plan to win that title from ye fair an' square!
target: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_250<tab>ああ、受けて立つぜ！

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_DRAKE_000_260<tab>Erm... Excuse me, Master Gerolt.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_DRAKE_000_260……あの、お師匠様。
盛り上がっているところ、すみません。

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_DRAKE_000_261<tab>I couldn't help but notice the kettle you've been working on, and seeing that you had just finished, I took it upon myself to look over the order. I'm sorry to report that it was due for delivery some time ago, and that...well...the order was canceled.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_DRAKE_000_261お師匠様の作ったそのヤカンなんですが、
気になって発注書を調べたところ、
納期を大幅に過ぎてしまって、発注取り消しになってますよ。

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_265<tab>...Eh?
target: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_265<tab>……え？

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_270<tab>Gerolt, how could you forget? When was this order placed?
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_270ゲロルト……。
お主、その発注をいつ受けた？

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_DRAKE_000_280<tab>Two, um...years ago.
target: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_DRAKE_000_280<tab>……2年前です。

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_290<tab>WHAT!? B-But we did all that work! <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> did all that bloody work! No, no, no! This can't be happenin'! Now where am I goin' to find a hundred million gil to pay off me bleedin' notes!?
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_290ンン！？　え、ええええ！？
せ、せっかく作ったってのに……発注取り消し……！？
10億ギルの報酬が……オレの借金返済の夢がッ！

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_295<tab>Pardon? You mean to say you were doing this for money all along!? And there I was thinking that I'd at last discovered a modicum of decency in the gutter that serves for your soul. I should have known better.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_295……なっ！？　人生を賭けているというから協力してみれば、
結局、借金絡みの案件だったとは！
クズはどこまでもクズか……呆れてものも言えん……。

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_300<tab>Hold on a minute! It's all comin' back to me now! This order came in 'round the time you barged in here, rantin' and ravin' about yer godsforsaken Zodiac Weapon, distractin' me from me work!
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_300ああン！？　何だとクソジジイ！
テメェが「ゾディアックウェポン」の話を持ってくるまでは、
しっかり覚えてたンだ。

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_301<tab>This is <var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var> fault, ye swivin', scabby-arsed, shite-eatin' streak o' piss! And you have the BALLS to ask fer that bleedin' title back!? Bollocks to that! I'm keepin' it─<var 1A 02 /var>fer good<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_GEROLT_000_301つまりは、テメェのせいだ！
『ゾディアックマイスター』の称号は絶対に返さないからな！
デェッ嫌いだ、バーーーーーーーッカ！！

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_305<tab>Over my dead body, you ale-sodden little has-been! It seems whatever affliction claimed your hair has taken your brain as well. The title of Starforger is mine by rights, and I <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> have it back─one way or another. Have at thee!
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_305なな、何だとこの野郎！
頭皮が死んでいるとは思っていたが、頭の中まで腐っていたとは！
その称号、開祖のために絶対に取り返してみせるぞ！！

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_DRAKE_000_310<tab><sigh> Oh, Master Gerolt...
target: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_DRAKE_000_310<tab>お師匠様ったら…………。

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_DRAKE_000_311<tab>Well, it appears our client no longer requires this kettle, and it would be a waste to let it sit and collect dust here in Hyrstmill. Might you be willing to take it? As a small token of appreciation for all you've done to help Master Gerolt. I'm sure he'd like you to have it. Quite sure.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_DRAKE_000_311冒険者さん、こちらのヤカンは不良在庫になってしまいました。
せめて、お師匠様に付き合っていただいたお礼に、
受け取っていただけませんか？

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_DRAKE_000_312<tab>After taking a closer look at it, I believe I can replicate the kettle should you ever require another, though I doubt it will be as fine as Master Gerolt's. You need only ask.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_DRAKE_000_312あと、あなた方とお師匠様の作品を見ていましたので、
もし必要でしたらヤカンを複製いたしますよ。
その時は、私までお声がけくださいね。

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_SYSTEM_000_900<tab>You now have access to a special selection of kettles from Drake.
target: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_SYSTEM_000_900<tab>ドレイクから、「ヤカン」を購入できるようになりました！

source: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_210<tab>Marked for deletion.
target: TEXT_SUBFST980_01670_JALZAHN_000_210<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
